name: Dental RPG Simulator
description:
You fall asleep without brushing your teeth and a series of wacky battles unfold in your dream. Created with Python + PySimpleGUI for a school project.

Features:

  • 4 turn-based battles, with dialogue and pixel art to accompany them!
  • A humorous? plot!
  • A functional GUI complete with color-coded buttons! (You don't see that very often)
  • A text reveal effect! (Don't worry, clicking "Next" repetitively will speed it up)
